task.summary: Odds are now functional, main program added, gui development started.
minor fixes + testing started (-> main has many exceptions).
Major update. - Everything should work now - including "test all". - Lots of changes have been made, and many old functions stopped working.
Tested and run: test all - everything seems to be in order - minor enhancements for printing time while running test all
Tested and run: test all - everything seems to be in order - minor enhancements for printing time while running test all
Blackjack can create it's own playbooks. Code looks very ugly and needs to be cleaned - however it should work!
Minor fixes here and there - testing starts
Betting didnt work on manual game - fixed by creating function ui_set_bet(players)

bug fixed in playbook.py which caused alphabetical orders to be reversed in playbook.
Also added lot of comments
